website_summaries.verdict: A functional, good-looking hall tree with plenty of space to hang and store items. Hook configuration is excellent for hanging multiple jackets and coats.
pros: This attractive model has 18 hooks on four levels, three shelves, sturdy metal tubing, and a money-back guarantee – impressive features for an affordable price tag
cons: Top rack is somewhat wobbly, and not ideal for hanging heavy coats
Plastic end caps can be difficult to snap into place

website_summaries.verdict: Different shape than the traditional rack, but we found for those with enough wall space, this coat stand offers extra storage shelves for shoes or bags.
pros: Flat shape allows for almost twice the capacity of other racks
Shelving provides flexibility for holding different types of items
cons: Not every space can fit this wider coat rack, which is 27.4" wide

customer_reviews.title: BEST SPA HACK EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a different way. I found that this item is very strong an sturdy, easy to put together and served the purpose I needed it for. I needed something in my bathroom that could hold more than two towels, this was it! Extra bath towels face towels no problem! I call it my spa rack, my girls love it and want one for themselves and want me to help them decorate it. I love this versatile coat/shoe rack, you can create so many different things with.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome I don’t have a closet in my bedroom (how I don’t know) but this really helped keep my jackets and towel and hoodies organized. I got the black my one and only complaint is that I’m having trouble getting the final screws on the back. I’ve taken it apart and tried again but the won’t fit. Overall it is really sturdy and should last a long time. And bonus it arrived early.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a storage solution
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to put together. Lots of hooks to hang items. You may want to attach it to the wall with a small strap depending on how loaded you have it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Howard

customer_reviews.title: excellent value and good sturdy coat rack.
customer_reviews.text: The tubes are sturdy, although the back is fitted tubes and do move around a bit. If you lift the rack by the back, the tubes will separate. The bolts fit well and no problem screwing them in. The shelves also sturdy and I (200 lbs) could sit on the top without any deflection. Finish is good enough. My fingernail did not leave any mark. Its value is excellent. Packaging was better than standard - foam pieces separating the tubes.
customer_reviews.author: ventingisok

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be well worth the money. We will see how it holds up to my sons Carharts.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Fit very nice in the space that ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! Fit very nice in the space that I have and it's beautiful. Very easy to set up. It's not the firmest one, but it's good. I recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great hall tree for the value.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, feels sturdy and works for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Product Does Not Fit Together Properly
customer_reviews.text: The plastic balls were the same size as the rods that they were supposed to go onto. It was extremely disappointing and no matter how much we tried to hammer them on, we still ended up with four completely unusable ones. Imagine you bought a brand new piano with four unusable keys, would you give that more than a single star rating? No. I hope this company can gets its measurements right for the next person who decides to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Lansing

customer_reviews.title: Very nice I love
customer_reviews.text: Love the material, pretty sturdy. Very pretty. Size is just right to fit bigger jackets on top and children's jackets on the bottom rack. I like how shoes fit right in at each tier. Instructions weren't very detailed just a layout on how it should be so pay very close attention on how you place the bolts it was a hassle at some points to aligne and tighten just right. Two people building this would have been easier. I did it my self so it took a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted this at back door so family could deposit bags and coats as they came home. Works great, but is so nice it could be used at the front door.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Ann

customer_reviews.title: wrong part otherwise good deal
customer_reviews.text: Well, first it's a nice little hall tree for the price. However they messed up on piece. If you put it together, you notice that each part where the outer face side where the screws will be are pushed in a bit, so that way when you are done, the screws won't stick out as much. That is fine for all piece except part D, where they gave me the same sides...so one side the screws stick out much more than the other. They give exact screws so becareful not to lose any. Overall, not too heavy a bit wobbly, worse if place on carpet. The bottom stands have screws so you can level it out for some stability.
customer_reviews.author: swan20

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.text: Really well structured and built. It holds soooo many coats and bags and shoes! The round ball nobs were already installed so that wasn’t an issue to attach them to the hooks. I put this thing together in about and hour while we watched a show. I didn’t need any help and the instructions were clear enough to figure out. I got the dark color so that the shoes don’t make the white look dirty too quickly and it honestly doesn’t matter what color it is because it’s completley covered in coats anyway. I opted to not use the round overhang bar and it’s nice to have the extra corner hooks for my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ella

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack is great, I've had it for over a year now and it still looks as good as the day I got it. We hang heavy jackets, put backpacks and purses on it, have shoes and umbrellas kept in the bottom and not once has it seemed like it may tip over or be off balance. It's super sturdy but also super light and easy to move if you ever need to. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts easily towards wall.
customer_reviews.text: Ill fitting plastic spacers were discarded, you don't need them for assembly. There were complaints of it tilting away from the wall. There are adjustable legs. Just push against the wall and crank the front legs all the way down, until it reaches the desired angle. I have mine tilted back because I load this with heavy coats. 4 stars because It was missing 4 screws for the connecting rods, but they're a slip fit and not necessarily needed for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: luggwrench

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: We just put it together last night. What a pain it was. Put a felt hat on one of the hooks before I went to bed. This morning the hat and the “permanent” hook were on the floor. The black hook scratched the wall when it broke off. I would return it but taking it apart would take forever, plus my husband threw away the box because we never anticipated it falling apart. Also... I can imagine it could easily get top heavy with coats. So only feather light items... oh, wait — My hat was feather light.
customer_reviews.author: Sideways Chica

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like the product it really lived up to it’s name
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Holes not drilled correctly
customer_reviews.text: Holes were not drilled correctly and the little plastic things that hold the shelves up split while tightening. It's also not very stable. You will not be able to return this to the seller after purchase. It will cost more to ship this back than it will cost to purchase this item over again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F.

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I eyed this for a month and as soon as the price dropped I bought it. It is very well made and my husband had it put together very quickly. I love that you can adjust the feet if you have uneven floors like we do. I can fit four pairs of shoes on each shelf. I put wooden boxes on the top shelf to organize mail. There are lots of hooks for hanging bags, jackets, and hats, otherwise those all use to be on the floor. Oh, and I can fit my sons small shoes or my sandals at the bottom under it. It sits just high enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Simplistic, Functional, & Durable!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed to bring our foyer to life! My kids hang their back packs on it and my husband sits his work bag on it and I hang my purse on it. Everyone’s daily belongings hang on it for easy access. Trying to find our sons backpack was a headache every morning but not any more lol. Can’t wait for the weather to get chilly so we can all hang or jackets and coats on it! Update now that it’s cold our coats hang there nicely. Multiple coats for each of us can fit. And we hang scarfs over the bar on top. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and is a beautiful addition to our home. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Value for my money and NOT from China
customer_reviews.text: This is such a refreshing change for made in China products. It is attractive, sturdy and so simple to assemble. I (76 years old with a tremor) had it assembled in less than an hour. The directions were clear and aside from one small bolt placement error (not marked) I had it done in no time. I highly recommend this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: K. T. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and simple! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Simple and does what I need it to do! I was worried it wouldn't hold heavy backpacks plus plus but it is stable and I great height for my 4 and 6 year old to reach the hooks!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and weak, but useful 😂💁‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: I don’t remember what I paid for this but I hope it wasn’t a lot. Pros: Easy to put together (20mins). Good space saver Multifunctional coat rack(shelves) Design doesn’t take up tons of room. Cons: Looks and feels a little cheap(good for a dorm) It can get top heavy pretty easy. (Easy tip over if you have kids or pets) Less then 7 inches between shelves, not useful for boots. Less then 4” between every hook and You’ll want to cover up The “poop” brown, screw on, plastic knobs ASAP...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This coat rack is awesome! It was very easy to assemble, took about an hour with some help from my boyfriend. It feels very sturdy and its pretty tall, which I like! I’ve been shopping around for a coat rack for a while and this one is definitely worth the money compared to other coat racks that I’ve seen for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great coat rack.
customer_reviews.text: Great coat rack. Sturdy and very easy to assemble. Think the complaints about it not fitting together are the result of people tightening screws as they put them in and not after they get a section fitted. Love it and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: John R.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It arrived quickly and was easy to put together by myself. Seems stable. I can fit 3 pairs of adult shoes, side by side on each level
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and stable
customer_reviews.text: fits and looks good in my small foyer area. As a crossing guard, I am able to store the multiple coats I have to use due to the variety of weather conditions possible in Mideast Coast USA. I also, like using the first shoe storage shelf to sit whatever I have in my hands on while I get out of my coats.
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This product was easy to assemble and looks good for the price. It seems sturdy and will work for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: We have a smaller apartment and this was exactly what we needed for our small "mudroom" to hang all our jackets and boots. I am not a professional when it comes to building things but this was yet another piece of furniture I got from Amazon that I mastered putting together by myself. Absolutely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: If you need a smaller coat rack for an entry way, found this to do the job. Easy to put together. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Anne

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: My area was very messy in the entry way. This purchase has made a big difference. Everything is at a convenient height. I wish I could fit more shoes. But I like that I don’t have to mount anything to the wall. I actually feel organized having one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K

customer_reviews.title: Does its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Some of the coat racks are easy to bend. However, it is useful in my living room, since I don’t have a closet out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jafar Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Yaheetech Hall Tree -- hold a lot of stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I use in a bedroom to hold purses and shoes, it holds a lot. It's nice looking and sturdy. Easy to assemble. I definitely recommend if you need extra storage. Would be great as a hall tree too.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Luck

customer_reviews.title: Compact, yet roomy
customer_reviews.text: Assembled easily but pay attention to the instructions. Unit fits in a corner, out of the way, but holds a lot of clothing. Be careful as it is very tall for the size of the base and can tip over if you pull on something hooked up high.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but it's easy enough to figure out how to put together
customer_reviews.text: Honestly surprised by the quality considering the price! Directions are lackluster, but it's easy enough to figure out how to put together. I was done in half an hour, and it easily supports my heavy backpack! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Roth

customer_reviews.title: Easy, useful, could be sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, holds lots of shoes and coats. I've received many compliments on how nice it looks. My only complaint is that it could stand to be a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: wookie1120

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and practical piece of furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over a similar model because this one’s hooks looked sturdier. I was not disappointed. This little guy is well made and a perfect fit for my tiny nyc apartment. I’m surprised because it’s relatively inexpensive. It is able to hold many coats and several bags (we had 4 parkas and 3 sweaters on it at one time). We spray painted it to match our decor but looks great in black shoukd you choose to keep it that way. The balls that cap the hooks were a pain to get on but we managed. As per the directions, don’t tighten the screws till the entire thing is assembled. That way you can square and level the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bbyrd20

customer_reviews.title: does the job!
customer_reviews.text: perfect size for me and my husband, coats and everyday shoes. it feels a bit too light, but for now we didnt have a problem and we do put loooots of stuff on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good amount of shoes, purses, jackets, etc. Not as study as I would hope, but definitely great for the price. Very each to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: mmyeah

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: While I was putting this together I noticed a lot of scratches, dings and dents. While this was pretty easy to put together, my instructions were not in order. Also, one of the ball caps for the hanger was in one of the pipes.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Makes organization EASY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Looks great and holds a TON. It is so nice to have a "catch all" area that has tons of hooks and shelves. I really love this and wish I had purchased it years ago instead of my inferior wall hooks and kids' bookbags and shoes thrown everywhere. What a difference in our organization this has made.
customer_reviews.author: TNMoon

customer_reviews.title: Wrong parts
customer_reviews.text: Two of the pools whete the hooks are are not matching and are the same as the other ones which makes it useless. My husband will have to cut them and drill holes in them in order to put the hooks on. Such a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Carlyangel

customer_reviews.title: Should've spent more on something else
customer_reviews.text: Showed up with scratches, rust, and black chipping off. Also scratches really easily and not very sturdy. Looks nice from afar.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous0000

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble. Sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.text: This rack is perfect for my seasonal needs. It’s very lightweight and easy to assemble. It’s slimmer than most, which means it fits nicely in my small hallway.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice....
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving my new entryway coat rack. Been debating whether to get it and so glad that i finally did. Assembly was a breeze except that i had to figure out what parts is what bc it doesn't say in the instructions besides give you pictures. So with the money spent I think it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Pinaypride

customer_reviews.title: Grab and go for accessories
customer_reviews.text: Put it together quickly as soon as it arrived. Allows me to display my current season bags, belts and frequently used shoes neatly just outside my closet so I can use that space for more clothes! Also had some two sided shower rings that I added to the top bar and use them to arrange some baseball hats. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Easy and simple
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together and fit perfectly against my wall. It holds a lot of jackets and bags and the shoe section is amazing. Easy to keep things organized when you get home from work
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette LaHood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my office
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the picture advertised and the directions were accurate. It was shipped in a timely fashion and it has adjustable feet to make sure it stands and is stable. Very happy with my purchase and it looks great in my office 😂
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Moody IV

customer_reviews.title: Met our needs
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to assemble and has met all our needs. As a family of 5 we definitely needed the space to hang out coats, the kids snow pants and book bags.
customer_reviews.author: Follett

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Fits great in the small space I had. It is a little unsturdy with coats and snow pants on the hooks, but I don't think it moves around enough to be tipped over by a toddler. I might look into anchoring it to the wall somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Arik

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Looks nicer than I expected, though it certainly won't fool furniture snobs. Holds plenty of coats and shoes. Kids haven't broken it yet, so it's definitely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: chertheatr

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to assemble and it fits perfectly in tight spots. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Diff

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to a small area
customer_reviews.text: Holds coats and book bags, for four kids, on the hooks and shoes on the shelves. A great addition to a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Walder

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely built sturdy and keeps my coats and shoes organized. Very happy with recommend to anyone who is looking to organize coats and shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sup

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy to assemble. quick ship, lots of hooks
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this rack. Seller was wonderful, answered my message to change the color, shipped super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: defective parts
customer_reviews.text: Some of the parts on this rack seemed defective and the screws would not go on properly. The instructions sheet was also misleading and didn't accurately give directions. Because of this it took an extra long time to put this coat rack together. It looks nice enough but alas the defective parts and poor instructions earned this product only three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wang

customer_reviews.title: It holds a LOT!
customer_reviews.text: would recommend esp if you have a lot of things to hang, like scarves, purses, jackets.
customer_reviews.author: greg P.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble . Good quality for the price. Nice place to hang jackets and scarves.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbrat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for light jackets and accessories.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for lightweight jackets purses and accessories and sneakers/low cut boots- not the best for heavy jackets as it fills up very quickly with larger coats.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I needed something to keep my home organized. Who knew this would make me so happy. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Donna, FL

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Fits in my living room. Got the coats off the chair and the shoes off the floor. Great product. Sturdy well made.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B.

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish
customer_reviews.text: It works great! The only downside is that one of the holes were drilled wrong, but I didn’t notice till we were almost done and didn’t want to deal with the hassle of exchanging.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this coat stand. It came well packaged. I'm a 73 year old woman, and had it assembled in 45 minutes without any help. The instructions were not as detailed as some, but a little common sense supplied the details. It looks very nice, and isn't wobbly at all. I'm very pleased and would recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Garland

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble if you follow the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Originally I received a disc golf net, returned the item no hassle, and a new one was express delivered the next day (guessing the seller realized their mistake). Easy to assemble if you follow the pictures... which I did not at first. Looks great in our entry, very compact
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to put together and solid! We use this for our biking gear and it has organized our space incredibly well!
customer_reviews.author: Bex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love it. So convenient for shoes, hats ,scrafs and coats. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We like all the hooks it offers and the shelving below for wet gloves and hats to dry. Sturdy for regular use. Would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Irma B

customer_reviews.title: Holds a lot of items.
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturing defect some of the welds were welded wrong on the hooks love the shoe racks
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Once i read the directions, it was super easy to put together. So far it’s very sturdy. The adjustable legs are a plus since my floor is slightly unlevel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Solid
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for my purses, hats, and scarfs. Fits perfectly in a corner of my bedroom. I highly recommend if you need something to fit the decor of your room that keeps the space neat.
customer_reviews.author: Princess C

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. It looks exactly like the one in the picture, plus it just takes 15 minutes to put it together (probably less if you're very handy)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is on the sturdy side. Metal is heavier gauge and will hold up for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Lee D.

customer_reviews.title: Charming and fits in small  space
customer_reviews.text: This is a charming little useful stand. It was pretty easy except the the plastic washers can be a challenge at times. My unit arrived slightly bent but overall I’m glad to have it
customer_reviews.author: JseVen

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup in 15 minutes. Looks as good as the picture. I'm happy I made that purchase. Helped contain our clutter by the apartment door.
customer_reviews.author: Sherif M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my apartment and it wasn't too bad to put together. It was a little smaller than I expected, but it will still work for me! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YES
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly in my living room. So glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny S

customer_reviews.title: It holds stuff, well. You figure out the punctuation.
customer_reviews.text: If feels pretty light but still sturdy, it's an easy 45 min project for a person to take on and I'm glad to have replaced my coat hanger with this
customer_reviews.author: Babatunde

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, i use it for coats and shoes. Nothing wrong to say and I give it 5 stars. I'm a woman and I set it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Leleine

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: One of the hole for the screw is not right
customer_reviews.author: MManalo

customer_reviews.title: Meets our needs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We needed a shoe and coat rack and this has worked for us perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Shotwell

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Qualitatively. Handsomely. Practical. For a little money is a very good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Oleksandr Shabala

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Using this coat rack at the back door of a small entryway. Keep shoes and boots off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: teresa thurston

customer_reviews.title: Recommend if you want to save money.
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good product. I was a little anxious about it, but it's pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: easy assembling! It's perfect, very functional and decorative. Eobhappy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: NinaOpina

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install, good instructions
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect for big or small places, enough to hang coats, bags and neatly arrange shoes Value is there too
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Aladin

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, really nice looking super helpful in my cluttered home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent front door shoe rack !
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and very useful specially if u have a small space at the entryway.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it for use in small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a hallway and have gotten good use it from it. Fit is great for any small space.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: No problems with assembly and frees up space in my coat/jacket closet
customer_reviews.author: Scott G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Inexpensivie
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect fit and addition in our new home. I found it fairly easy to assemble and will definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Woods

customer_reviews.title: Almost too lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, but I wish the bottom were heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hall closet
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a dead space in the hall in a house with no closet. This is attractive and seems to hold a lot although I haven't filled it up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcy Allwein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entryway coat and shoe holder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe rack holder. Great for all our jackets, hats and shoes. The only reason gave 4, after assembly the top portion isn’t straight and a bit askew. But I love it!
customer_reviews.author: ANGELICA

customer_reviews.title: this product is perfect and very useful
customer_reviews.text: this product shows a good quality and i like the design/color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hendry Chendrawan

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to put together. Very sturdy. Doesn't take a huge space and yet holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: CGD

customer_reviews.title: Box had been opened before - assembly instructions were gone.
customer_reviews.text: Paint on coat rack was scratched. No assembly instructions were included in box. This was the second one of these I had ordered. If I hadn’t had the first one to look at while I was assembling it, I probably could not have gotten it done.
customer_reviews.author: G Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and was easy to install. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because all my winter gear was laying all over my house & was starting to drive me insane. This product is easy to ensemble, looks great and is very well made. I searched forever to find a good reliable coat/shoe rack and I did. Thank you Yaheetech!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of parts
customer_reviews.text: This item was light weight but had sturdy parts. It had too many parts and I'm not great with assembling so it wasn't a good fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Slwats31

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Quick assembly and holds a whole lot of stuff!!!! Three racks for shoes but we place our diper bag and work bags on the top. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

product_meta.title: YAHEETECH Hall Tree Metal Entryway 18 Hooks Coat Rack with 3-Tier Shoe Rack Bench Hat Umbrella Stand Hallway Organiser,Entryway Bench with Coat Rack Black
feature_bullets: High quality: Constructed of powder coated metal tube, antirust and durable, won't be out of shape, strong and sturdy, coat rack heavy duty.
18 hooks coat rack: 18 hooks in 4 levels can be used for you and your kids' clothes, bags, hat, purse and handbags in different height and type.

3-tier shoe rack: 3-tier ample metal shelves provided to organize various size shoes , shoe boxes, and storage boxes. 3-tier shoe rack is suitable for keeping your shoes neat and organized. You can also storage your handbags on the top shelf.

Versatile：A great multipurpose combination of coat rack and shoe rack, an ideal storage solution for your living room, bedroom, office and entryway to well organize your clothes, shoes, umbrellas, hats and bags.

Sturdy: The rack is made of high-quality metal tubes. It is sturdy enough for you to hang clothes, hats or put your shoes. The max. load capacity of upper hanging rack is 8 kg/17.6 lb, 15kg/33lb for hook hanger and 40kg /88.2lb for shoe rack.
